About this Chatbot

This a simple voice enabled shopping Wishlist maker chatbot. This bot uses voice recognition and NLP to understand user input and send out a correct response.

Follow the instructions given by the bot to make a shopping list.

Add this web page to your mobile home screen to access it easily.

Developed by Niraj Nair.

About Me

I'm an Information Technology Engineering student passionate about Data Science and Web Development.

How To Use?

Click on the microphone button to give an input as suggested by the bot. Make a list of items then for every item you buy just click on the checkbox to cancel it out.

You can even add items after you make a list so that you don't miss out on anything.

After you purchase an item from the list just click the checkbox to cancel out the item.
